title: One Piece: Why Zoro's Most Badass Moment Still Resonates With Me 19 Years Later
author: ScreenRant Editorial
description: An in-depth analysis of why Zoro's 'Nothing Happened' scene from Episode 377 remains one of the most powerful moments in anime history nearly two decades after it aired. The article explores Zoro's understated loyalty, character definition, and the scene's thematic importance to One Piece.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the full context of Zoro's sacrifice scene

title: 17 Years Ago On This Day in One Piece, Nothing Happened
author: FandomWire
description: A retrospective article commemorating the 17th anniversary of Episode 377's air date. Discusses the episode's impact on the series and how Zoro's sacrifice saved Luffy for future arcs including Impel Down and Marineford.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: References later arcs including Impel Down and Marineford

title: One Piece: How Kuma's Past Explains Zoro's Thriller Bark Ordeal
author: GameRant
description: Analysis of how the revelations in Chapter 1097 about Kuma's past and his connection to Dragon provide new context for his actions during the Thriller Bark arc, particularly his decision to test and spare the Straw Hats.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains manga spoilers about Kuma's backstory from Chapter 1097

title: One Piece Double Recap: Episodes 377 & 378
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: Detailed recap and analysis of Episodes 377 and 378, covering Zoro's confrontation with Kuma, the pain transfer deal, and the aftermath of Zoro's sacrifice. Emphasizes the episode's core theme of crew loyalty and sacrifice.

title: NOTHING HAPPENED || ZORO TAKE LUFFY PAIN | ONE PIECE EPISODE 377 REACTION MASHUP
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction mashup compilation featuring multiple content creators reacting to the iconic 'Nothing Happened' scene from Episode 377. Shows the universal emotional impact of Zoro's sacrifice across different viewers.

title: Zoro Nothing Happened Moment Reaction One Piece Episode 377
author: Various Reactors
description: Compilation of emotional reactions to Zoro's legendary 'Nothing Happened' moment, showcasing why this scene resonates so powerfully with One Piece fans worldwide.

title: NOTHING HAPPENED! ZORO'S SACRIFICE ONE PIECE EPISODE 377 BEST REACTION COMPILATION
author: Various Reactors
description: Best reaction compilation for Episode 377 featuring reactors experiencing Zoro's sacrifice for the first time. Demonstrates the scene's emotional impact and why it's considered one of anime's greatest moments.

title: One Piece What If?: What Would've Kuma Done if Zoro Hadn't Proved His Loyalty to Luffy?
author: FandomWire Editorial
description: Speculative analysis exploring alternative scenarios for Episode 377 - what would have happened if Zoro had not been willing to take Luffy's pain, and how Kuma might have responded.

title: 377: The Pain of My Crewmates Is My Pain! Zoro's Desperate Fight!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: First-time viewer's reaction and analysis of Episode 377, providing perspective on how the episode impacts someone experiencing it fresh without prior knowledge of its iconic status.

title: One Piece: 10 Best Episodes of the Thriller Bark Saga, Ranked
author: CBR Editorial
description: Ranking of the best episodes from the Thriller Bark arc. While Episode 377 is not explicitly ranked in visible portions, Episode 378 (the immediate aftermath) is included, indicating 377's significance to the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoilers for entire Thriller Bark arc
